site.title: Johannes Herold — Entrepreneur & AI Investor
site.description: Entrepreneur and AI investor with 30+ years experience. Creator of wynd, flowboost, breathe, and checkdomain (acquired by group.ONE). Building AI-powered systems that amplify human potential.

hero.claim: Creating ventures with clarity, flow and purpose.
hero.intro: I build digital platforms and AI-driven systems designed for clarity, scale, and long-term impact. Founder of checkdomain. Tech entrepreneur for over 30 years.

blog.title: Blog
blog.description: Articles about tech, AI and entrepreneurship

about.title: About
about.description: Tech entrepreneur based in Lübeck, Germany. Building end-to-end systems from infrastructure to AI-driven products for over 30 years.
